text: Aurelio Terrazas (28 April 1904 - 22 September 1984) was a Mexican long- distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1904 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Mexican male long- distance runners Category:Mexican male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Mexico Category:Sportspeople from Chihuahua (state)
title: Aurelio Terrazas
